What We Do

1.

Open Source Firmware

Our firmware base for the ESP32 and ESP8266 allows the same ease of use as Arduino without compromising on performance, customisability or licensing.

2.

Licensed Code Kits

Our battle-tested, customisable code kits for mobile and voice apps make building great IoT apps painless.

3.

Web Dashboard

Subscribe to our robust web based dashboard that integrates with your existing IoT and authentication backends while enabling best-in-class OTA, device management, visualisation and analytics.

4.

Team Mentoring

Hire us to help your team ship great IoT products through code reviews, technical discussions, architectural advice and training.
